data.name: Space Hack
data.detailed_description:
Isometric Sci-Fi Action RPG Combat

Space Hack is an isometric action RPG that combines classic hack-and-slash combat with a dark science-fiction setting. When a mysterious gravitational anomaly consumes the colony ship Maximus, alien invaders swarm the vessel and slaughter its inhabitants. As one of the last surviving soldiers, you must fight your way through the ship and rescue as many colonists as possible before it’s too late.

Fast-Paced Hack-and-Slash Gameplay

Battle through 45 hand-crafted levels filled with enemies, upgrades, and loot. Combat is real-time and action-focused, designed for players who enjoy constant movement, ability use, and enemy encounters rather than slow tactical play.

Progression is deep and long-form, with a full playthrough easily exceeding 50 hours for players who explore thoroughly and complete optional objectives.

A Dark, Combat-Focused Sci-Fi Experience

Space Hack focuses on gameplay first: continuous combat, character progression, and survival against overwhelming odds. The ship’s environments range from industrial corridors to alien-infested zones, creating a consistent sense of pressure and isolation as you push toward the escape pods.

Key Features

  • Isometric action RPG set in a science-fiction universe

  • Hack-and-slash combat with real-time action

  • 45 levels aboard a massive colony ship

  • Long-form progression with 50+ hours of gameplay

  • Rescue colonists while fighting alien invaders

  • Dark sci-fi atmosphere focused on combat and survival

  • Single-player, offline experience

data.short_description: Space Hack is an isometric action RPG set in space, featuring fast-paced hack-and-slash combat, loot progression, and dozens of levels to explore aboard a doomed colony ship.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Windows compatible mouse and keyboard. Be sure to add main.exe to DEP list. If you are experiencing technical difficulties please email support@meridian4.com
